604650.name: Fantasy Grounds - Daring Tales of Adventure 05: Sky Pirates of the Caribbean (Savage Worlds)
604650.description:
Daring Tales of Adventure #05: Sky Pirates of the Caribbean
A Fantasy Grounds II Adventure module from Triple Ace Games
Deep in the Bermuda Triangle trouble awaits our heroes!
In recent months a large number of cargo planes and ships have gone missing whilst
traveling through the mysterious area now known as the Bermuda Triangle.
Reports of these disappearances have been kept secret from the wider populace in
the hope of avoiding alarm. These missing planes and ships are not caused by aliens
or even freak weather. This is simply piracy!
Flying high above the cloud layer is a highly advanced flying airfield. It stays
there using a variety of advanced engineering and weird science, it hovers undetected
allowing the Sky Pirates to swoop on unsuspecting victims!
Our heroes are thrust into the middle of this adventure when they are persuaded
to take a vacation in Cuba. Once attacked by the Sky Pirates they discover the real
reason for the missing ships and planes!
Sky Pirates of the Caribbean is a high octane pulp adventure that takes your heroes
on a wild ride in the clouds!
This product is an installable module for use with the Fantasy Ground II virtual
tabletop. The adventure module has been carefully organized to streamline gameplay
and includes, story elements, personalities, items, vehicles and images. These can
be modified within your Fantasy Grounds campaign as needed. The Savage Worlds ruleset
and a Full license of Fantasy Grounds II are required to use this product.
Author: Paul Wiggy Wade-Williams
Fantasy Grounds II Conversion: Clemens Meyer
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Clemens Meyer
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
